columns.name: enabled_by_default
columns.description: Indicates whether the standard is enabled by default.

columns.name: standards_status
columns.description: The status of the standard subscription.

columns.name: standards_status_reason_code
columns.description: The reason code that represents the reason for the current status of a standard subscription.

columns.name: standards_subscription_arn
columns.description: The ARN of a resource that represents your subscription to a supported standard.

columns.name: standards_input
columns.description: A key-value pair of input for the standard.

columns.name: standards_managed_by
columns.description: Provides details about the management of a security standard.
